items.title: India investigates 17 'mysterious' deaths in same village
items.description: At least 17 people, mostly children, have died unexplained deaths in the same village in Jammu.

items.title: Nepal hits Everest climbers with higher permit fees
items.description: The price to climb the world's tallest peak will soon increase for the first time in almost a decade.

items.title: Trump tells Putin to end 'ridiculous war' in Ukraine or face new sanctions
items.description: The US president says he is offering Moscow a "big favour" by helping Russia and Ukraine reach a deal.

items.title: Thousands evacuated as new fast-growing fire ignites near Los Angeles
items.description: The out-of-control wildfire spans more than 10,000 acres after just a few hours, fuelled by winds.

items.title: Meta denies forcing users to follow Trump accounts
items.description: The Facebook and Instagram owner says the official profiles were updated to reflect the new position holders.
